testsuite.name: RIB trades reversal in LMEsmart
testsuite.system-out: Feature Description: State: 9 - Pending Acceptance H - Pending Other Side Acceptance

testcase.name: Successful reversal of buy side in RIB House inter-office trade in LMEsmart - Forward [F]
testcase.system-out: Given I logged in to LMEsmart as a RIB user.......................................passed When I submit the RIB trades details below.......................................passed And I select 'Trade Management' in the menubar.......................................passed Then the trade should have the column value on the 'Rib Trade Management Page' as below.......................................passed When I reverse the Buy trade in RIB Trade Management table.......................................passed Then the trade should have the column value on the 'Rib Trade Management Page' as below.......................................passed And the trade should be updated with values below by executing query 'get_trade_detail_audit_for_trade_leg_by_trade_half_id' from database 'LMEMATCHING'.......................................passed And the Reverse_Buy trade should have tags value below in the 'DiagnosticsLog' under the ‘TradeStatusFeed’ folder.......................................passed And the Reverse_Sell trade should have tags value below in the 'DiagnosticsLog' under the ‘TradeStatusFeed’ folder.......................................passed And the trades should be updated with the values below in the 'DiagnosticsLog' under the 'MatchingController' folder.......................................passed
